data.description: Parse BIND zone files into Net::DNS records
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Originally I suggested this module as a replacement of
    Net::DNS::ZoneFile module to its author, but after we discussed the
    matter we agreed that two modules, though they have a lot in common,
    have a different focus. While Net::DNS::ZoneFile concentrates on
    completeness, Net::DNS::ZoneFile::Fast concentrates on practicality
    and processing speed.

    Actually, it was Luis who suggested the current name.
